name: Herald
description:
Try this maze quest with a sphere droid in searchof treasures, evade and fight ancient enemies.

WASD to move.

Candle Shots with "Right control".

Arrow Shots with "Right shift".

Axe slash with "l".

Take the items in pairs related, avoid enemies or kill them to going to next scene. :)

This is my first game (testing) in Gdevelop and I try to learn and put to practice the mechanics of this game engine.

If you want to write me, this is my email

chiratos@gmail.com

Twitter: @chanovic
